comments.body: We'll need to add annotations to these parameters as well - one more reason to do the loop flip above.
50763f6 has the changes to annotate these params

A helper function (doesn't need to be a method) that just gets called in both places could help avoid the repetition here.

Something like: `type_annotations[arg.name()] = ParamAnnotation(type_annotations, arg);`
I recommend using two maps to avoid mixing attrs with inputs/outputs: for example, attr_types and input_output_types.
Resolving this since we spoke offline about how the op's parameters include both inputs and attrs.
Add a TODO to handle multiple return types.
